text:
Upper Thomson MRT station (TE8) is a future underground Mass Rapid Transit station on the Thomson–East Coast line in Bishan, Singapore. The station will be located at the traffic junction of Upper Thomson Road, Soo Chow Garden Road, Bright Hill Drive and Jalan Keli. It will provide MRT access to the nearby Thomson Plaza.
History.
This station was first announced on 29 August 2012.
